description:
We all want to become better leaders and more influential, but how? Where do you start? A recent Google search for 'leadership book' resulted in 425 million search results. 'Leadership program' received 447 million search results. Who's got time to read text books or attend programs when we need to become better leaders NOW!

This short, sharp course will provide you with the basics of becoming a better leader. It has helped thousands of supervisors, managers and CEOs - even senior executives have benefited from this practical program.

The program consists of a 12 page, downloadable workbook and seven short video modules. Each module has a practical exercise that is completed after watching the video.

It is recommended that you complete a module every three days, so the entire program should take three weeks, leaving time in between the modules to implement the changes.

Greg Mowbray is a leadership expert - author, speaker, mentor and consultant - with over 30 years of professional experience, he cuts to the chase and makes the complex simple.
title: Leadership Bootcamp
